description:
While Reflejo, Viole (Bam), Khun, and Rak are engaged in their final showdown, FUG and the Workshop attempt to pour a solution capable of melting everything into the area... Lero Ro and Endorsi rush to their three companions in order to save them, but FUG Rankers and Team Mad Dog stand in their way! Will Viole and the others be able to escape safely?!
Source: Crunchyroll
